title.rendered: What is the Process for SEO for a New Website?

content.rendered:
How can I get SEO for my website faster than my competitors?

By when can I reap the benefits of SEO?

Why can’t my website start to rank on the first page of the SERP page?

If you are pondering over these thoughts, then let us remind you, “there is no shortcut to success”
Over several years of search engine’s existence, SEO has found its unique place in optimizing brands across online platforms. However, SEO does not come as an instant recipe, it is a long term investment that bears bigger fruits when practiced efficiently in the long term. It is an organic way of inviting your target audience and pleasing the search engines including the use of the right keywords and relevant links.

Why do we need SEO for any business?

If you want to promote your online business, in the best organic way, then SEO is the best tool to boost your business. Boosting categories of your product on your website, especially if you are creating a niche, then SEO can do a great deal of good by bringing your target customers to you! A unique blend of content marketing and Search Engine Optimization techniques happens due to the latent semantic index or LSI. This unique concoction of SEO+content can befriend the search engines and ensure better SERP results.

Understanding SEO:

Many businesses set the goals to rank #1 in an organic way(via a natural listing on SERP) on Google or Bing to seem prudent to their customers. However, if you manage to rank, it becomes important to recognize that ranking may not necessarily mean conversions. Eventually, there may be higher web traffic and click-through rate(CTR) but if your on-page optimization is not executed well for conversions then it may not result well for your business. To encourage conversions is as essential as keyword research and thus SEO must be followed religiously on a concurrent basis.

Essential ranking secrets!

Do not forget that “Content is King”

Again the LSI – latent semantics are key- so make sure your content has it all conveyed. Longer content that is informative and original only ranks well.

Fresh content:

Current events and Industry updated content are very important- the google freshness algorithm monitors the changes in the industry and only the freshest concepts bag the first prize!

User Experience

An easily navigatable website that is aesthetic creates a higher dwell time on your website. Design, sitemaps, proper functionality to encourage conversions – all in all, the UX is vital for any web visitor to become a client.

Conclusion:

Effective strategies need effort! and SEO is an on-going investment that nurtures your company’s online organic growth! Join Jetquins Travels to make your effort in search engine optimization fruitful !!
